brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to determine the imputability of adverse events in patients who have had phage therapy for the treatment of their bone or joint or implant infection, in order to find out whether these adverse effects are related to surgery, antibiotic treatment or bacteriophages.

primary_outcome.measure: rate of patients having had an adverse event
primary_outcome.description: number of patients having had an adverse event

primary_outcome.measure: rate of adverse event attributable to the surgery
primary_outcome.description: number of patients having had an adverse event because of the surgery

primary_outcome.measure: type of adverse event attributable to the surgery
rate of adverse event attributable to the antibiotic treatment
primary_outcome.description: number of patients having had an adverse event because of the antibiotic treatment

primary_outcome.measure: rate of adverse event attributable to the phagotherapy
primary_outcome.description: number of patients having had an adverse event because of phagotherapy
